decision_conditions: The proposed development, by reason of the height of the monopole and the sites location within Metropolitan Open Land (MOL), and Public Open Space, would constitute inappropriate development and would result in a dominant and visually intrusive feature within the surrounding area resulting in harm to the character and appearance of the surrounding area and the setting and visual amenity of the MOL and Public Open Space. The proposal is therefore contrary to policies G3 and G4 of the London Plan 2021 and policies 23, 24, 25 and 28 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018.

The proposed development's siting and appearance by reason of the height and massing of the proposed mast would result in a dominant, imposing and overbearing form of development which would appear visually prominent and as an incongruous feature within the setting. The proposal would therefore result in harm to the character of the area and no degree of camouflaging of the mast would reduce this impact and the proposal would be contrary to policies 23 and 28 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018.
